EmailTemplate.name: Investor Request Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Investor Request Case Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.User__c},
The case, {!Case.Subject} for {!Case.Contact} of {!Case.Account} has been completed by {!Case.OwnerFullName}.
If you have any questions or concerns please reach to {!Case.OwnerFullName} for more details.
Case Link: {!Case.Link}
Thanks,
Salesforce Team
